Page.Name: About
Page.Title: The project
Page.Content:
This project was developed as part of the Computational Theory course.
The project has the purpose to show the importance of Touring Machines, by simulating a Multi-track Touring Machine.
This project was developed in Windows Prosentation Fundation (WPF), using C# and XAML.
For more information about the project, you can access the source code in GitHub.com .
